location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter reports that Shaik Saddoon [Sheikh Sa‘dūn] has been given a favourable reception at Schyrass [Shiraz], although no agreement has yet been reached with the Caun [Karim Khan]. Also discussed is the will and effects of the late William Bowyear, who died aboard the Defiancewhen it blew up in November.
